title: Delete this from my account, i never wanted it
body: I made an account specifically for ARAM.  I got to lvl 30, and I've just been buying champions that I like for ARAM.  I got 3 champion shards and rerolled them thinking it would give me another shard.  The description wasn't clear enough and now i have Rengar, who I hate and don't want on this account.  Please just delete it off my account.  I don't even want shards or anything.  I just don't want that champion to be rollable every ARAM game I play.

replies.body:
No worries. Keep in mind when we remove this champion we will not refund any shards that were used, and we won't be able to add him back afterwards.

Just respond to my comment here letting me know you're okay with this and I'll get him removed for ya!

> [{quoted}](name=Broporo,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=r2lxrArr,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-10-05T02:50:45.859+0000)
>
> No worries. Keep in mind when we remove this champion we will not refund any shards that were used, and we won't be able to add him back afterwards.
> 
> Just respond to my comment here letting me know you're okay with this and I'll get him removed for ya!

Yes, it's fine if you don't give me any shards and it's fine that you can't add him back if I request it.  Please proceed with removing Rengar.
Sorry it took so long, you caught me on my weekend.  Got this taken care of for ya just now!
Don't enable Aram only players ðŸ˜’

While I don't personally agree with people using smurf accounts for ARAM's, it's not really against any of Riot's policies perse (that I'm aware of at least). Since he got Rengar through a random shard reroll and is perfectly fine with not actually getting any kind of refund for it, there's really no point to deny this kind of request.
Maybe Riot should just enable all champions for ARAM to prevent accounts like these from existing.

lol I don't seriously expect you to not help him.

I just think players like this totally ruin the point of aram so they can get unfair advantages, which is kinda shitty.

There is no good in helping it imo.

Aram account are what make the mode unfun for player who don't do them (the idea of all champ available in the mode pop each month on the board for a reason)
So yes, it's not banable to do so, but is not really a good solution to help them keep their "aram account" perfect when they screw up.

It just feel like your company take the side of aram account player and not care for the repercussion for other player (since now basically every player who want an aram account just need to ask support to do one for them :s)


It's too late for this case but please, make it be the case who open a discussion at your office this week, so you have a clear rule about those request. (and if it come to it being ok for the mode then fine, we will surrend aram to those player and find another mode to use where random isn't "rigged" by champion pool disparency)
